 Usage   : 
 Function : Returns method_id(s) by method name 
 Returns : single key or array
 Args    : method name
 Warnings: warns if single key is expected, but multiple entries are found

Methods code

get_method_by_namedescriptiontopprevnext
sub get_method_by_name {
my ($self,$mname)=@_;
my $mh=$self->prepare("select distinct method_id from method where method='$mname'");
$mh->execute||die;
my @mn;
while (my $m=$mh->fetchrow_array) {
    push @mn,$m;
}
warn if ((@mh>1)&&(!wantarray));
return wantarray?@mn:$mn[0];
}
known_methodsdescriptiontopprevnext
sub known_methods {
 my $self=shift;
my $mh=$self->prepare("select distinct method name from method");
$mh->execute||die;
my @methods;
while (my $m=$mh->fetchrow_array) {
    push @methods,$m;
}
return @methods;
}
